RedRingID.description: Which red ring this is, from 0-4 (NOT 1-5!!).

Type.description: What this object does when triggered by an event. Visible means the object will start off visible, and become invisible when triggered. Invisible means the object will start off invisible, and become visible when triggered.

RotateType.description: Which up vector this object rotates around.

Extra.value: They're rings which are red. Not at all related to red coins from a platformer series involving an Italian plumber.
